0px"},"margin":{"xl":"","lg":"","md":"","sm":"","xs":""},"width":{"xl":"58.333333333333%","lg":"58.333333333333%","md":"58.333333333333%","sm":"100%","xs":"100%"},"hidden_xl":0,"hidden_lg":0},"addons":[{"id":1535365384258,"name":"text_block","visibility":true,"settings":{"admin_label":"","title":"","heading_selector":"h3","title_fontsize":"","title_lineheight":"","title_letterspace":"0","text":"

Universiti Teknologi MARA (UiTM) is the largest comprehensive university in Malaysia, providing innovative education with state-of-the-art infrastructure and technology within reach at its 34 campuses, 24 faculties, 9 academic centres and 2 institutes of leadership and development across the country.<\/p>

UiTM offers over 500 academic programmes at Foundation, Pre-Diploma, Diploma, Bachelor\u2019s, Master\u2019s, and PhD levels, as well as Professional Programmes. It continues to expand access to higher education, playing a crucial role in nation-building by unleashing potentials and shaping the future.<\/p>

<\/p>

UiTM has consistently been ranked among the top institutions in various reputable rankings, both locally and globally. Among these accolades are the Times Higher Education (THE), UI GreenMetric, and the QS World University Rankings. The university has also received recognition for its commitment to the Sustainable Development Goals. UiTM was further honoured with the title 'Employers' Choice of University' by Talentbank and has maintained outstanding performances in the SETARA rating and MyRA score, as recognised by the Ministry of Higher Education. These achievements serve as a testament to UiTM\u2019s academic and research excellence, as well as its graduates\u2019 employability on the global stage.<\/p>

<\/p>

With over 800,000 alumni in science, technology, humanities, and entrepreneurship, UiTM offers opportunities to shape leaders at national, industry, and global levels and is well-positioned to become a globally renowned university by 2025.<\/p>","alignment":"","text_fontsize":{"xl":"18","lg":"","md":"","sm":"16","xs":"16"},"text_lineheight":{"xl":"29","lg":"","md":"","sm":"","xs":""},"dropcap":0,"class":"","global_background_type":"none","global_background_gradient":{"color":"#00c6fb","color2":"#005bea","deg":"45","type":"linear"},"global_use_overlay":0,"global_background_repeat":"no-repeat","global_background_size":"cover","global_background_attachment":"inherit","global_user_border":0,"global_border_width":"","global_border_radius":0,"global_margin":{"xl":"0px UiTM is currently ranked 116th in the QS Asia University Rankings: 2026 and 542nd in the QS World University Rankings 2026. The rankings affirm the university's continuous effort to enhance academic quality and graduate employability. In line with its establishment philosophy, UiTM continues to offer tertiary education opportunities in various academic programmes to economically disadvantaged students from rural areas, with the hope of improving their families' socioeconomic background. Marking 69 years of existence, UiTM has played a continuous role in driving development and offering contributions, particularly in meeting the country\u2019s demands to improve the socio-economic imbalance in the community, with a focus on the Malays and Bumiputera. It is envisaged that all efforts and achievements obtained through the aspirations of making UiTM a Globally Renowned University over the past five years will continue to serve their purpose for the next ten years. May UiTM remain relevant, projecting a more precise and effective global image and branding.<\/p>","alignment":"","global_text_color":"#FFFFFF"}}]}],"parent":{"rowId":"b1b6d603-44fe-4c36-96a4-72c8d1ab2c40","columnId":"6989c9b2-507c-4dc8-82e0-8475f8b7e16b"}}]
